hud-message.failed-set-font: {{fontType}} set failed. See SMAPI console for details.
config.example-text.description: Text for adjustion when setting fonts. '\n' means a line break. I suggest you to use one line break, i.e, two lines, so you can recognize line spacing more.
config.section.fonts.description: Set the fonts for the current language.
config.fonts.font-size.description: Set the font size, in pixels.
config.fonts.spacing.description: Set the distance between two horizontal characters.
config.fonts.line-spacing.description: Set the distance between two lines.
